descriptionHtml:
This is just a sneak/archer build savegame i made had on my xbox360 but i converted it to pc so u can us it as a save game if u want, its NOT a 100% save but i did finish ALOT OF QUESTS i legitly mean ALOT most quest you still see are: The Dark Brotherhood Forever and some miscellanous quest, it so u can just use it if u want to use mods on it i hope its a decent save just tell me please
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />and to use it download it and copy/extract it to the next:  C:\Users\Documents\MyGames\Skyrim\Saves
<br /><br /><br /> for the normal skyrim and since it is a unmodded save u can use it for special edition as well if im right: C:\Users\Documents\MyGames\SkyrimSpecialEdition\Saves
author: ItsMeBroh
